titles: The testament of master Wylliam Tracie esquier, expounded both by Willism Tindall and Iho[n] Frith. Wherin thou shalt perceyue with what charitie y[e] chaunceler of Worcester burned whan he toke vp the deek carkas and made asshes of hit after hit was buried
author: Frith, John, 1503-1533.
Tyndale, William, d. 1536.
notes: Publisher and place of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Tracy, William, d. 1530 --  Early works to 1800.
